name: Spicy Avocado Chickpea Salad Sandwich
description: Easy Smashed Avocado Chickpea Salad sandwich spiced with cumin and cayenne. Serve over soft fresh bread layered with greens and juicy tomatoes.

video.name: Spiced Chickpea Avocado Salad Sandwich | VEGAN RICHA RECIPES
video.description:
Easy Smashed Avocado Chickpea Salad sandwich spiced with cumin and cayenne. Serve over soft fresh bread layered with greens and juicy tomatoes.

FULL RECIPE HERE: https://www.veganricha.com/2015/09/spicy-avocado-chickpea-salad-sandwich.html

This easy spiced up Avocado Chickpea salad  is great in sandwiches, tacos or wraps, or in a bowl of greens and roasted veggies. Try this fabulous Smashed Chickpea Avocado Sandwich with other spices and other beans of choice. Add some hemp seeds, or toasted sunflower seeds for crunch..  

BUY MY COOKBOOK: http://www.veganricha.com/vegan-richas-everyday-kitchen

Burgers: https://www.veganricha.com/category/burger

recipeIngredient: 1 15 oz can chickpeas drained  (or 1.5 cups cooked)
a generous pinch of garam masala (optional , or use ground chipotle pepper)
juice of 1 lime (less or more to preference)
a generous dash of black pepper
Greens (, tomatoes, sprouts, salt and pepper)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mash the chickpeas and avocado until avocado is well mashed and most of the chickpeas are not whole.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mash the chickpeas and avocado until avocado is well mashed and most of the chickpeas are not whole.

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the ingredients from onion through spices. Mix in. Taste and adjust salt and spice.
recipeInstructions.name: Add all the ingredients from onion through spices. Mix in. Taste and adjust salt and spice.

recipeInstructions.text: Prep the sandwich bread by toasting if needed. Add a layer of greens or micro-greens of choice. Layer a good helping of the smashed chickpea avocado mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep the sandwich bread by toasting if needed. Add a layer of greens or micro-greens of choice. Layer a good helping of the smashed chickpea avocado mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a layer of juicy tomatoes or sprouts and serve. Use this mash in sandwiches, tacos, wraps or salad bowl. Change up the spices for variation
recipeInstructions.name: Add a layer of juicy tomatoes or sprouts and serve. Use this mash in sandwiches, tacos, wraps or salad bowl. Change up the spices for variation
